item.title: Cisco Smart Satellite Manager (SSM) Server AlmaLinux Upgrade Overview
item.author: robert.profit82@gmail.com (Robert Profit)
item.description: As most of the other Cisco Unified Communications products are requiring migration from the underlying CentOS to AlmaLinux, the on-premises satellite license server is no exception. Here are a few high level steps needed in order to migrate.
